entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Prepend $(NoWarn) to list analyzer rule generates a false positive. #74087
  • Run a single generator at a time #74086
  • Can't see primary constructor variables in debugger #74082
  • Add IL Viewer for .NET languages #74080
  • Add string to NameOf option in intellisense #74079
  • Automatic class initialization scaffolding #74078
  • Add assembly version information to method tooltips #74077
  • switch expression: Warning CS8524 issued although all cases have been covered #74076
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #74074
  • [Bug] IDE0058 not work #74073
  • Error in 【MSBuildWorkspace.Create() .OpenSolutionAsync()】：System.Exception (cannotfound BuildHost) #74070

Closed

  • Make fields generated in a primary constructor able to be readonly #74081
  • ISymbol.ToMinimalDisplayString() ignores the SymbolDisplayTypeQualificationStyle.NameOnly formatting option. #74071

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle unspecified anonymous type property in VisualBasicOperationFactory #74091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP logging #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix error recovery for various nested conversion scenarios #74089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • On the fly docs - add telemetry regarding documentation comments #74088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test #74085
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid re-running all codeaction requests at low priority. #74083
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid allocations in AbstractSyntaxIndex<>.GetIndexAsync #74075
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow `InlineArray` attribute on a record struct type. #74072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • [LSP] Support "implementation" folding range kinds #74069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add some missing LSP protocol definitions #74068
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create new AsyncServiceProvider instead of using AsyncServiceProvider.GlobalProvider #74084
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ide options #74053
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable end-to-end binding and emit for basic scenarios involving instance extension members. #74012
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
